links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 20080); x=0; for (n=1, 20000, x=10*x + 1 + issquare(9+8*n)); x/=10^20000; x=contfrac(x); for (n=1, 20000, write("b056030.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 08 2009
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 24 2000
